contents.text: Welcome to Swrve, headquartered in San Francisco and recognized as a leader in mobile marketing platforms by Gartner.
For sales and product information on our mobile marketing platform, press 1.
To speak with a sales representative about our Gartner-recognized platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Talk to a sales representative about pricing and platform features.
Get detailed product info and pricing to evaluate Swrve for my veteran-owned business
Discuss enterprise licensing tiers and API integration specifics for the Swrve mobile marketing platform with a sales rep
I need to speak with someone about the cost and features of your mobile marketing platform.
Inquire about Swrve’s mobile marketing features and pricing for my physics research app

contents.text: To request a personalized demo or trial, press 2.
Please hold while we arrange your demo request.

navigationGoals: Request a personalized demo of the mobile marketing platform.
Schedule a personalized demo to see how Swrve can support my veteran outreach campaign
Schedule a hands-on sandbox trial and personalized walkthrough of your platform’s SDK features
I’d like to arrange a personalized demo or trial so I can see how the platform works.
Arrange a personalized trial to test Swrve’s analytics on my experiment data

contents.text: For customer and technical support, press 2.
For technical support and assistance with our platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Connect with technical support to troubleshoot a platform issue.
Resolve technical issues integrating Swrve's SDK into my app
Troubleshoot an SDK integration error and get technical support guidance
I’m having trouble with the software and need technical assistance to get it running.
Troubleshoot SDK integration for event tracking in my physics experiment app

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Inquire about a billing charge on my account.
Review my billing statement and update my account payment details
Resolve a billing discrepancy on my monthly subscription invoice and clarify account charges
I have questions about my invoice and need help with billing and account charges.
Verify and understand the billing charges on my student Swrve subscription
